ichor.common.bool module¶

ichor.common.daemon module¶

class Daemon(pidfile: str, stdin: str = '/dev/null', stdout: str = '/dev/null', stderr: str = '/dev/null')¶

Bases: abc.ABC

A generic daemon class.

Usage: subclass the Daemon class and override the run() method

Credit: Sander Marechal (https://bit.ly/3frF5RK)

check()¶
daemonize()¶

do the UNIX double-fork magic, see Stevens’ “Advanced Programming in the UNIX Environment” for details (ISBN 0201563177) http://www.erlenstar.demon.co.uk/unix/faq_2.html#SEC16

delpid()¶
restart()¶

Restart the daemon

abstract run()¶
start()¶

Start the daemon

stop()¶

Stop the daemon
